XsDataPacket_Private::SimpleVariant< T > Struct Template Reference

Template base class for simple single value Variants. memcpy is assumed to result in valid objects. More...

Detailed Description

template<typename T>
struct XsDataPacket_Private::SimpleVariant< T >

Template base class for simple single value Variants. memcpy is assumed to result in valid objects.

Member Function Documentation

template<typename T >
Variant* XsDataPacket_Private::SimpleVariant< T >::clone ( ) const
inlineoverridevirtual

Create a copy of the Variant.

Returns
A pointer to the newly created Variant
Note
This needs to be reimplemented in each subclass!

Implements XsDataPacket_Private::Variant.
